name: The Roxbury, Contemporary Catskill Lodging

reviews.text: Great people, great stay, great anniversary!!!
reviews.title: An anniversary to remember at the Roxbury!!
A Unique place to return to again and again
reviews.text: Me & my husband stayed at The Roxbury May 13-15 2006, and I have to say, it was an amazing experience. We went for an anniversary weekend getaway and loved the stay. Greg,one of the owners, arranged everything for us by phone, and was as friendly and pleasant in person as he was on the phone. The staff made It feel like we

Cool comforts in the Catskills

reviews.title: RUN (don't walk) to The Roxbury!!
reviews.text: absolutley lovely, funky and romantic!! I never thought I'd appreciate the color of

reviews.title: A "Motel" beyond your wildest dreams
reviews.text: We just stayed in one of the Kitchenette room at the Roxbury Motel last night. .

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stylish decor, extremely comfortable bed (ours was King size), beautiful tent nearby the stream to relax, have a glass of wine and read,amazing attention to details (quotes on your bedside table, fresh blooms in the bathroom, quality shampoo and more,...), friendly owner and staff, vast collection of DVD... and affordable.
reviews.title: charming-chic-clean
Great Stay
reviews.text: The kind of place we always dream of finding but rarely do.

What a truely amazing place!! Set in beautiful scenery, everything about this motel is perfect! The rooms are amazingly decorated (the guys here have a fantastic eye for funky and unusual but classy decor!!), the pillow top beds are an absolute dream (fantastic nights sleep!). Any questions we had about the local area, ideas for trips out, where to eat etc, the guys were extremely helpfully. Honestly I've never stayed in a more friendly hotel, not much more I can say except book this place, you will never regret it!!!!
reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous!!!
Peace, love and harmony at the Roxbury!
reviews.text: We will never forget our stay at the Roxbury! From the minute we arrived, we were treated like family. Our room was beautifully decorated with a sophisticated, trendy atmosphere. Greg was highly informative about activities in the area, and seemed to know exactly what we were looking for. He recommended everything from restaurants to the amazingly beautiful nature getaways, with detailed driving directions and even menus! The grounds at the Roxbury were in themselves a wonderful nature getaway. Everything was emaculately kept with great attention to detail. We loved it so much we stayed an extra day! Greg, Joe and Cecilia only added to the charm and intimacy of the Roxbury, with sincere hospitality and warmth. We will return to the Roxbury as often as we can!!!

aka: The Roxbury, Contemporary Catskill Lodging Hotel Roxbury
description: Welcome to The Roxbury, a supercool boutique hotel nestled amongst the picturesque Catskill Mountains. Whether you call it "cool design," "whimsical elegance," or, our favorite, "decadently over-the top," we're all about design and how it makes your feel. At The Roxbury, we want to make you smile.
